Klaus Gjasula followed up an own goal with a stoppage-time equaliser as Albania stunned Croatia to secure a 2-2 draw.
Klaus Gjasula scored an own goal and then a last-gasp equalizer for Albania in a 2-2 draw with Croatia.
Klaus Gjasula redeemed himself in the fifth minute of stoppage time with a low finish to earn Albania a point.
Klaus Gjasula turned into his own net via an unfortunate ricochet 14 minutes from time.
Klaus Gjasula scored a late equaliser in the 90'+5' minute for Albania.
Qazim Laci scored in the 11th minute from a superb cross by Jasir Asani.
Andrej Kramaric scored the equaliser for Croatia in the 74th minute.
Andrej Kramaric cut a lovely finish into the bottom corner to equalize for Croatia.
Qazim Laci scored the first goal for Albania in the 11th minute.
Andrej Kramaric grabbed a 74th minute equaliser on his 33rd birthday.
Klaus Gjasula came off the bench after 72 minutes for Qazim Laci.
Klaus Gjasula scored an own goal, making it 2-1 for Croatia.
Mitaj pulled back a wonderful low cross for Gjasula to score the equaliser in stoppage time.
Qazim Laci squeezed a header home on 11 minutes to give Albania an early lead.
Qazim Laçi scored for Albania in the 11th minute.
Andrej Kramaric equalized for Croatia about half an hour into the second half.
Klaus Gjasula redeemed himself by scoring the equalizer in the 95th minute.
Klaus Gjasula scored an own goal making it 2-1 for Croatia.
Klaus Gjasula scored for Albania in the 90'+5' minute.
Luka Sucic’s shot from Ante Budimir’s cutback was blocked by Berat Djimsiti and cannoned off Gjasula into the net, resulting in an own goal.
Two minutes later, a cross intended for Luka Sucic pinballed in the penalty area before being turned in by Albania’s defensive midfielder Klaus Gjasula.
Gjasula scored a late equalizer for Albania, sweeping the ball calmly past Dominik Livakovic.
Andrej Kramaric scored for Croatia in the 74th minute.
Andrej Kramaric equalized for Croatia in the 74th minute.
Klaus Gjasula scored an own goal in the 76th minute, putting Croatia ahead.
Mateo Kovacic's shot was saved in the 90'+8' minute.
Andrej Kramaric equalized for Croatia by squeezing a shot through Elseid Hysaj’s legs.
Qazim Laci's 11th minute header put Albania in an early lead.
Klaus Gjasula scored an own goal for Albania in the 76th minute.
